hero.title: Keep everyone in the loop
hero.subtitle: Show real-time wait times on public displays, TVs, or personal devices. Transparency builds trust and reduces anxiety.

sections.title: Public display mode
sections.description: Mount a TV or tablet at your entrance to show the current waitlist. Guests see their position and estimated wait time at a glance.

bullets.text: Real-time updates as the queue moves
Clean, readable interface optimized for distance viewing
Works on any screen with a web browser
No special hardware or software required

sections.title: Personal status pages
sections.description: Each guest gets a unique link to track their position on their own device. They can wait anywhere—at a nearby café, in their car, or browsing local shops.

bullets.text: Live position tracking with estimated wait time
SMS and email notifications when their table is ready
Guests can cancel their spot if plans change
No app download required—just a web link

sections.title: Why transparency matters
sections.subtitle: When guests know where they stand, everyone wins

features.title: Reduced perceived wait time
features.description: Guests who can track their progress feel like they're waiting less, even if the actual time is the same.

features.title: Fewer "how long?" questions
features.description: When information is visible, your team spends less time fielding the same questions over and over.

features.title: Better guest experience
features.description: Clear communication builds trust. Guests are more patient when they know what to expect.

seo.title: Virtual Waiting Room
seo.description: Public displays and status pages that keep guests informed. Real-time wait times on any screen.
